reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 493/20: ALTERNATIVE ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS FOR THERAPY OR COUNSELLING
reg_info.reg_name_text: ALTERNATIVE ELIGIBILITY REQUIREMENTS FOR THERAPY OR COUNSELLING

content.content: 2. For the purposes of subsection 58.1 (6) of the Act, a person’s eligibility to receive funding ceases upon the withdrawal by the student, or in the case of a minor, the student’s parent or guardian, of the allegation of sexual abuse or prohibited act involving child pornography.
content.raw_html: 2. For the purposes of subsection 58.1 (6) of the Act, a person’s eligibility to receive funding ceases upon the withdrawal by the student, or in the case of a minor, the student’s parent or guardian, of the allegation of sexual abuse or prohibited act involving child pornography.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
